name: Melody Madness
description:
Move with the up and down arrows

Shoot with left click or 'X'

Shoot empty notes to fill them up. See you % of notes hit at the end of the song.

There are some issues with the scale; the stave should run to the edges of the viewport but ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

It should work in the downloadable

Max - Code, Art, Tetris Level

Connor - Additional Code, Old McDonald Level

Kat - Title Art, Lavender Town Level

Glenn - Title Art
